column2: ENGLISH

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have a humble request for you in light of your debt to us. There is no rest in our defense against the infidel and we have desperate need of knights to lead our men. Thus, I would like to extend this opportunity to your able and noble [FromFrom.GetSonDaughter] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to serve in our ranks. Naturally, this would disinherit [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. May [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] bless you,\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3:
Très juste [Root.GetTitledFirstName], j'ai une humble requête à vous soumettre, qui a trait à votre dette envers l'Ordre.

Comme vous le savez, notre lutte contre les infidèles ne connaît aucun répit et nous avons grand besoin de chevaliers. Nous présentons donc l'opportunité à votre fils [FromFrom.GetFirstName] de servir dans nos rangs afin de rembourser votre emprunt. Notez cependant que cet engagement le déshériterait.

Grand Maître [From.GetFirstName]
column4: Rechtschaffenste[Root.GetrMale] [Root.GetTitledFirstName], ich habe eine bescheidende Bitte an euch angesichts eurer Schulden an uns. Unsere Verteidigung gegen die Ungläubigen hat keine Ruhe und wir brauchen dringend Ritter, um unsere Männer anzuführen. Ich möchte diese Gelegenheit daher nutzen, um euren fähigen und edlen Sohn [FromFrom.GetFirstName] anzufordern, um in unseren Reihen zu dienen. Natürlich würde dies ihn enterben. Möge [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] euch segnen,\n\nGroßmeister [From.GetFirstName]
column6: Just[Root.GetOA] [Root.GetTitleFirstName]. Quisiera haceros una humilde petición respecto a la deuda que tenéis que nosotros. La lucha contra el infiel no descansa y estamos muy necesitados de caballeros que dirijan a nuestros hombres. Así pues, me gustaría extender la invitación a servir en nuestras filas a vuestro a capaz y noble hijo [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Por supuesto, esto le desheredaría. Que [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] os bendiga.\n\nGran Maestre [From.GetFirstName]

column2:
To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting the life of your [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName] to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
[Root.Get_Au_TitledName],
Nous avons pris note de votre plaidoyer véhément pour le pardon et Nous sommes certain que vous aurez hâte de prouver la sincérité de votre repentance en vouant la vie d'un de vos enfants [From.Get_au_HighGod].

Cordialement,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
An [Root.GetTitledName],
Wir haben eure leidenschaftliche Bitte um Vergebung zur Kenntnis genommen und sind sicher, dass ihr die Aufrichtigkeit eurer Reue beweisen werdet, indem ihr eines eurer Kinder dem Leben von [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] widmet.

Hochachtungsvoll,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
A [Root.GetTitledName], 
Hemos escuchado tu apasionada petición de perdón y Nos estamos seguros que desearás mostrar la sinceridad de tu arrepentimiento dedicando la vida de uno de tus hijos a [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Atentamente, 
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting the life of your [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName] to defence of the [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] as a member of.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has determined that the price for my wickedness is the life of my [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName]. It's a good day for learning, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. As you may know, our order is in need of leaders, and, considering your debt to us, I would like to request that your able and noble son [FromFrom.GetFirstName] serve in our ranks. Naturally, this would disinherit [From.GetHerHim]. For Science!\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Flaming Swords walk with the Serpent and are prepared to give their lives to defend [From.GetHerHim], but, one has to wonder, are you?

With anger and sadness,

Warchief [From.GetFirstName]

Expel the Order of Our Lady Liberty
I can drive the Order of Our Lady Liberty from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate 300¤ to the Order of Our Lady Liberty
I can donate money to the Order of Our Lady Liberty in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the judicary.
Vassalize the Order of Our Lady Liberty
In exchange for dominion over the [c_palisades.GetName], the Order of Our Lady Liberty is willing to become my vassal.

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Order of Our Lady Liberty in their quest to preserve and protect the Lady, even though this will forever disinherit [From.GetHerHim].
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Order of Our Lady Liberty.

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to serve the will of Lady Liberty! You have my friendship, as well as that of the judicary.

May Lady Liberty watch over you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order of Our Lady Liberty is in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

May Lady Liberty watch over you,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The Order of Our Lady Liberty has constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Order of Our Lady Liberty serve at the pleasure of the Lady, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Expelled the Order of Our Lady Liberty
